result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James B. BASLER

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.  
State moves to dismiss and read in these charges.  The defendant entered pleas in Case Files 15 CM 715, 16 CM 39, 16 CM 118, and 16 CM 85.   Motion granted.  
$50.00 cash bail applied to costs in 15 CM 715.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for James B. BASLER
Current: 1830 South 35th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 02-02-2016)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

$50.00 cash bail furnished at the time of arrest.
$50.00 cash bail and bail bond delivered to the Clerk of Court Office on 02-01-16.  
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant in custody.
Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with District Attorney set for 02-12-16 at 11:00 a.m.  Plea date is set for 03-17-16 at 2:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody on bench warrant.  The matter is continued for an initial appearance on 01-25-16 at 1:30 p.m.  The $500.00 recognizance bond previously furnished is modified to $50.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no contact with Kenneth Root or any premises he occupies.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed. 
Bench warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Defendant failed to appear for initial appearance.   Bench warrant authorized.   
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of disorderly conduct and 3 counts bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 01-11-16 at 1:30 p.m. Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he have no contact with Kenneth Root or any premises he occupies and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
